name: SpielDB 2015
description:
Offline database of Board Game Geek's "Spiel Preview", for those of us who don't want roaming fees abroad, or just anyone that wants a quick and easy way to search and filter in the vast amount of games released.

Features include searching, filtering, and the ability to mark favorites in a few different categories (colors).

http://boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/174654/spiel-2015-preview

This app is in no way affiliated with Board Game Geek, Internationale Spieltage or any board game publisher. All right are reserved to their respective owners.
